channel.title: Class 20 help please

item.title: Class 20 help please
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

I’ve started coding a new client and I want to add new animations to it. The problem is that I do not know how to properly change the code to something that would work for my new client. If someone could show me how that would be great.

My clients dclaws emote:

[code]if(k == 2068)
{
char c4 = ‘\u077F’;
Class20 class20 = aClass20Array351[k];
if(FrameStart[c4] < 1)
{
Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, c4);
}
int ai101[] = {
75, 75, 62, 62, 93, 93, 93, 82, 82, 57,
57, 71, 71, 66, 66, 66, 61, 92, 73, 73,
65, 65, 89, 89, 70, 70, 81, 81, 67, 67,
67, 84, 59, 63, 63, 99, 99, 78, 69, 69,
96, 96, 74, 74, 74, 79, 90, 90, 94, 94,
58, 0
};
class20.anInt352 = ai101.length - 1;
class20.anIntArray353 = new int[ai101.length - 1];
class20.anIntArray354 = new int[ai101.length - 1];
class20.anIntArray355 = new int[ai101.length - 1];
class20.anInt363 = 0;
class20.anInt364 = 0;
for(int l3 = 0; l3 < ai101.length - 1; l3++)
{
class20.anIntArray353[l3] = ai101[l3] + FrameStart[c4];
class20.anIntArray354[l3] = -1;
class20.anIntArray355[l3] = 2;
}

        }[/code]

A normal clients d claws emote:

if(j == 6000){ int file = 1686; Class20 a = aClass20Array351[j]; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,75,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 2; } }
